participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Active and energetic, enjoys fitness and staying healthy.
participant_1.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. eating is something i do when i'm bored.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, with a passion for outdoor activities and coffee.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i am a huge coffee lover. i don't drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker.
